about_the_game:
SAMAGO is an endless 2D Platformer with a 24-hour twist! Each level is up for 24 hours to compete against other players, or you can play PRACTICE MODE with changing layouts after each death. Can you reach the furthest and top of the Leaderboards?

24-Hours Cycle

For 24 hours every player has the same level layout, as you play you can see other players' attempts from all over the world! After 24-Hours a new level is formed and scores are reset.

Practice, Practice, And Practice

Want to have a more relaxed time? Play in PRACTICE MODE, after each run level layout is changed. Enjoy this more casual approach to SAMAGO and when you have honed your skills feel free to climb up the leaderboards in main mode!

Make Your Frog Your Own

Customize your Frog with different types, costumes, and trails that can be seen by other players!

name: Samago

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Any recent processor
  • Graphics: Any recent graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything goes

short_description: SAMAGO is endless 2D Platformer with 24-hour twist! Each level is up for 24-hours to compete in against other players!
